Packages that use CA
nl.nikhef.jgridstart Core jGridstart functionality regarding .globus-type certificates.

Uses of CA in nl.nikhef.jgridstart
 

Methods in nl.nikhef.jgridstart that return CA
protected  CA CertificatePair.getCA()
          Return the correct CA for this CertificatePair.
 

Uses of CA in nl.nikhef.jgridstart.ca
 

Classes in nl.nikhef.jgridstart.ca that implement CA
 class DutchGridCA
          This class is used interface with the DutchGrid production CA
 class LocalCA
          A certificate authority that runs locally and signs using a generated certificate.
 class TestCA
          This class is used to download a certificate from the Test CA
 

Methods in nl.nikhef.jgridstart.ca that return CA
static CA CAFactory.getCA(String name)
          Returns a CA by name.
static CA CAFactory.getDefault()
          Returns the default CA implementation, or null if not found.
